Scanner

Class PacketManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • Scanner.PacketManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    class PacketManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class stores the current captures, filtered captures, current conversations, and handles any computation or parsing of packets.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      PacketManager()
      Default Constructor

      • setProtocolFilters

        static void setProtocolFilters(boolean tcp,
                               boolean udp,
                               boolean icmp,
                               boolean arp)
        Assign protocol filters to PacketManager
        Parameters:
        tcp - True if filtering TCP Packets
        udp - True if filtering UDP Packets
        icmp - True if filtering ICMP Packets
        arp - True if filtering ARP Packets

      • setIPAddressFilter

        static void setIPAddressFilter(java.net.InetAddress ip,
                               boolean isSource,
                               boolean isDestination)
        Assign ip filters to PacketManager
        Parameters:
        ip - IP to be filtered
        isSource - True if IP is the source
        isDestination - True if IP is the destination

      • setSourcePort

        static void setSourcePort(int port,
                          boolean isSource,
                          boolean isDestination)
        Set Port filters to be used
        Parameters:
        port - Port to be filtered
        isSource - True if Port is the source
        isDestination - True if Port is the destination

                  throws java.net.UnknownHostException

      • filterProtocolCheck

        static boolean filterProtocolCheck(Packet packet)
        Verifies if the Protocol filter matches the current packet
        Parameters:
        packet - Packet to check
        Returns:
        True if current packet is a match

      • filterIPCheck

        static boolean filterIPCheck(Packet packet)
        Verifies if IP and/or port are a match
        Parameters:
        packet - Packet to check
        Returns:
        True if the current packet is a match

      • populateConversations

        static void populateConversations()
        The function searches for all of the existing conversations in the current capture. The conversations are saved in a nested ArrayList, where the first element is always the source, and the remaining elements are destinations from that source.

      • getConversationsSize

        static int getConversationsSize()
        Gets the total number of IP sources
        Returns:
        Size of conversation array list

      • getConversation

        static java.util.ArrayList getConversation(int n)
        Gets the IP source and all destinations
        Parameters:
        n - The conversation to be retrieved
        Returns:
        An ArrayList containing a source and all of its destinations

      • saveCapture

        static void saveCapture(java.io.File file)
        This function writes the current capture to an object output stream
        Parameters:
        file - File that the current capture will be saved to

      • openCapture

        static void openCapture(java.io.File file)
        This function inputs all objects from the saved file into the current capture ArrayList.
        Parameters:
        file - Previously captured file to be imported
